if.test: keyword != '' and keyword != null and type != 'a'.toString()

trim.foreach:
or
boardtitle like ('%${keyword}%')
boardcontent like ('%${keyword}%')
userid like ('%${keyword}%')
tag like ('%${keyword}%')

mapper.insert: insert into board(boardtitle, boardcontent, userid, tag, titleImage) values(#{boardtitle}, #{boardcontent}, #{userid}, #{tag}, #{titleImage})
mapper.select: select max(boardnum) from board where userid=#{userid}

SELECT * FROM board b WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM board_report c WHERE b.boardnum = c.boardnum GROUP BY c.boardnum HAVING COUNT(*) > 4 ) AND boardnum > 0 order by boardnum desc limit #{startrow}, #{amount}
select count(*) from board b where NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM board_report c WHERE b.boardnum = c.boardnum GROUP BY c.boardnum HAVING COUNT(*) > 4 ) AND boardnum > 0
select count(*) from board_report where boardnum = #{boardnum} AND userid = #{userid}
select count(*) from reply_report where replynum = #{replynum} AND userid = #{userid}
select count(*) from board_like where boardnum = #{boardnum} AND userid = #{userid}
mapper.delete: delete from board_like where boardnum = #{boardnum} AND userid = #{userid}
mapper.select: select count(*) from board_like where boardnum = #{boardnum}
select count(*) from reply where boardnum = #{boardnum};

select b.boardnum, b.boardtitle, b.boardcontent, b.userid, b.boardregdate, b.boardreadcnt, b.tag, b.titleImage, count(bl.userid) as like_count from board b left join board_like bl on b.boardnum = bl.boardnum group by b.boardnum order by like_count desc limit 4;
